Usage.P1: After clicking start the page will refresh and you will be prompted to check whether your issue still exists. This will repeat multiple times until the culprit was found.
Usage.P2: After the culprit was found you will be able to choose whether you want to reactivate all currently activated modules or not.
Usage.P3: Don't worry if you accidently close one of the popups, just refresh the page manually and it will reappear.
